attributes.action: Restrict & control fuel prices to an affordable level and monitor fuel stations.
attributes.additional_details: Because the extra money from fuel is going in the government pockets as like all of you are being bribed off. You have the control of United Kingdom and slowly are killing the UK and it’s people off. There has been very little support and not much action in helping the citizens, no reassurance and no restrictions on greedy companies
attributes.background: Step up and control/ monitor every single fuel station as the increase is killing off the working class. We are not comfortably living anymore because everything has increased apart from everyone’s wages! The fuel station garages are purposely increasing their profits and the government are quiet.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Set up an independent regulator to monitor and regulate vehicle fuel pricing:https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/605282

Cap profit fuel forecourt operators can make on petrol and diesel to 10p/litre: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/616956
